title: Bitcoin’s Next Milestone: $250K In Sight After $120K Test, Analyst Says
body: Bitcoin spent about nine months stuck below $110 K before finally pushing past that ceiling this month. The move up to $123,000 shows real buying power. According to EliteOptionsTrader, a crypto expert, many investors see this as the start of something bigger. Related Reading: Avalanche Shatters Record With 20M Transactions—Is Real-World Use Finally Here? Key Catalysts Driving The Surge Based on examination by EliteOptionsTrader, one of the biggest factors is the potential approval of a spot Ethereum ETF. Bitcoin’s own ETFs have pulled in billions from major institutions, and a greenlight for Ethereum could send more money into crypto overall, lifting Bitcoin further. The US election is now behind us, and talk of Federal Reserve rate cuts in late 2025 is fueling bets on a weaker dollar. Many traders view Bitcoin as a shield against political or economic swings. At the same time, hedge funds, sovereign wealth funds, and pension plans hold only small slices of Bitcoin so far. If they decide to jump in, that could push prices even higher. Bitcoin’s Road to $250K in 2025? 🚀$BTC has been consolidating under 110k for the last 9 months and finally broke out this month. As of now we already test 120k and looks like we are in route to testing 150k in the coming weeks. One thing to note, after something bases for such… pic.twitter.com/GGUrcUcp0D — EliteOptionsTrader (@EliteOptions2) July 15, 2025 Long Base Could Support Further Gains Bitcoin’s lengthy base under $110K sets a solid foundation. Breakouts after long periods of sideways action often lead to steep rallies. Still, it’s normal for prices to dip back toward the breakout zone. A pullback to around $115K–$118K could happen before any major surge. Traders will be watching support at $118K and resistance near $125K. Brewing Institutional FOMO Even after the rally, big players have only dipped their toes in. EliteOptionsTrader notes that a major allocation wave—from a large pension fund or insurance giant—could trigger fresh price discovery. And let’s not forget the April 2024 halving, which cut Bitcoin’s daily issuance by half. That supply shock often takes several months to show its full effect, but we’re seeing demand tick up already. Even with a strong start, the path up isn’t without hazards. Sharp corrections of 10%–20% are part of crypto’s genes. Any surprise rules from major markets could stall this run. Related Reading: If You’re Wealthy, 1 Bitcoin Should Already Be In Your Wallet, Expert Says On Cautious Optimism And Targets If Bitcoin can clear $127K, the odds of a parabolic move rise sharply. Based on analysis by EliteOptionsTrader, a test of $150K in the next few weeks looks within reach. That said, aiming for $250K by year end will require all these factors to line up without a single major setback. Bitcoin’s latest breakout feels exciting, but traders should keep a close eye on how it handles new support levels. Riding the trend can pay off, yet managing risk is just as important as spotting the next high. Featured image from Meta, chart from TradingView

title: Tesla is launching a longer, six-seat Model Y SUV in China this autumn
body: Tesla has announced the imminent launch of its bigger Model Y variant called the “Model Y L.” The larger SUV is Tesla’s attempt to appeal to Chinese customers and divert attention from domestic EV brands to its products after facing several losses in the Chinese market. Tesla Inc. is introducing a longer, six-seat version of its popular Model Y SUV in China. This move is widely seen as the company’s attempt to regain market share in the world’s largest electric vehicle (EV) market. The new variant, called the Model Y L, will be about 150 centimeters (5.9 inches) longer than the standard version, according to details published Wednesday by China’s Ministry of Industry and Information Technology (MIIT). While the company has not disclosed the price or release date, Tesla confirmed the vehicle’s launch on its official Weibo account. “Model Y L, see you in the autumn!” The post read. It also included two teaser images. The company also confirmed that LG New Energy will be supplying the batteries for the vehicle. Tesla is expanding its Model Y in China The Model Y is Tesla’s top-selling car globally, and its performance in China is critical to Tesla’s overall success. The company’s Shanghai gigafactory is a major export hub and production center. In recent months, Tesla has faced mounting pressure in China from increasingly competitive local brands that offer a wider variety of EVs with more features and lower price points. Chinese consumers have shown growing interest in multi-seat electric SUVs, especially those with tech-enhanced driving experiences, entertainment systems, and autonomous driving support. Tesla’s new design may aim to close that gap. The competition in China’s EV market Tesla’s decision to update the Model Y is due to the recent downturn in its sales in China. The EV maker recently broke an eight-month streak of declining shipments from its Shanghai factory, but it is still lagging in the EV industry in terms of wholesale growth. Xiaomi, best known as a smartphone manufacturer, recently entered the EV space with models targeting Tesla’s market share, emphasizing smart connectivity, competitive pricing, and stylish designs. BYD, in particular, has dominated the local EV scene, offering a broader portfolio of options ranging from compact electric sedans to high-end SUVs. Tesla has not confirmed whether the bigger SUV will include localized features or software upgrades to match competitors’ smart cabin functions. The company is also yet to clarify if the longer model will retain the same driving range, performance, or price efficiency as the base SUV, which starts at 263,500 yuan, about $36,700. Industry watchers have also noted that Tesla has recently been relying on price cuts and discounts to maintain demand in China, which could affect the Model Y L’s pricing strategy. title: XRP Has Completely Cleared Liquidation Clusters. Here’s What Is Next
body: XRP has reached a pivotal moment in its price journey. In a bold update shared by crypto analyst STEPH IS CRYPTO on X, XRP has “completely cleared liquidation clusters,” signaling the removal of a major barrier that has long hindered upward momentum. With those resistance levels now behind, analysts believe the stage is set for an aggressive rally, and the sky may truly be the limit. What Clearing Liquidation Clusters Mean for XRP Liquidation clusters are zones where large numbers of leveraged positions, especially short positions, are forced to close. These areas typically act as resistance zones, where price surges trigger a wave of liquidations that momentarily cap momentum. XRP clearing these clusters means that sell pressure from these forced closures has been absorbed, leaving little resistance ahead. According to STEPH IS CRYPTO, this development opens the door for XRP to push past $3 with conviction. Market analysts agree: now that these clusters are behind, XRP is primed to move freely and possibly accelerate toward new highs. BREAKING: #XRP HAS COMPLETELY CLEARED LIQUIDATION CLUSTERS. THE SKY IS THE LIMIT NOW. pic.twitter.com/2r4RvSPz27 — STEPH IS CRYPTO (@Steph_iscrypto) July 16, 2025 XRP Price Update: Poised Near Breakout As of report time, XRP is trading around $2.98, with intraday highs touching the $3.00 mark. This comes after weeks of building bullish momentum and increasing trade volume, suggesting growing institutional interest. Analysts are closely watching the $3.04 to $3.14 zone. A strong break and hold above this range could ignite a short squeeze, where short sellers rapidly buy back positions, fueling a fast climb to $3.40 and potentially higher. Technical forecasters like Peter Brandt have already predicted a 60% surge for XRP, placing a mid-term target in the $4–$5 range, provided momentum continues and macro conditions remain favorable. We are on twitter, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 — TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) July 15, 2023 Catalysts Behind XRP’s Strength Several factors beyond price charts are reinforcing XRP’s bullish setup. Anticipation for a U.S.-based XRP futures ETF is driving fresh interest, as such a product would open the asset to broader institutional flows. Meanwhile, Ripple continues to expand globally, securing licensing wins and forming strategic partnerships in Europe and the Middle East. Additionally, the recent resolution of key legal matters with the SEC, while still open to final appeals, has significantly reduced regulatory uncertainty. Ripple’s push for a U.S. banking charter is also seen as a move to cement its legitimacy in traditional finance, potentially boosting XRP adoption across compliant platforms. What’s Next for XRP? Now that liquidation clusters are cleared, all eyes are on XRP’s ability to break and sustain above $3. If successful, momentum could push the price toward $3.40, $3.75, and even challenge its all-time high in the weeks ahead. However, if bulls fail to hold above $2.95, a short-term correction to $2.80 or even $2.60 remains possible. In the bigger picture, XRP appears to be entering a new phase. With major resistance levels behind it, institutional interest rising, and market sentiment improving, the digital asset may be on the verge of its most significant rally in years. For now, XRP holders have reason to be optimistic. As STEPH IS CRYPTO put it: “The sky is the limit now.” Disclaimer : This content is meant to inform and should not be considered financial advice. title: Massive USDC Mint Signals Bullish Crypto Market Confidence
body: BitcoinWorld Massive USDC Mint Signals Bullish Crypto Market Confidence The cryptocurrency world is constantly buzzing with activity, and a recent announcement from Whale Alert has certainly captured attention: a staggering 250 million USDC has been minted at the USDC Treasury. This significant event is more than just a number; it carries profound implications for the broader crypto market , liquidity, and the evolving landscape of digital finance. For anyone tracking the pulse of digital assets, understanding the ripple effects of such a large-scale minting operation is crucial. Let us delve into what this means for investors, traders, and the future of decentralized finance. What Does a 250 Million USDC Mint Truly Mean? When 250 million USDC is minted, it signifies a substantial injection of new stablecoin supply into the ecosystem. USDC, or USD Coin, is a digital stablecoin pegged to the U.S. dollar on a 1:1 basis, meaning one USDC is always intended to be worth one U.S. dollar. It is issued by Centre, a consortium founded by Circle and Coinbase. The minting process involves Circle receiving fiat currency (U.S. dollars) from institutional clients or large entities, and in return, issuing an equivalent amount of USDC tokens. This process increases the total supply of USDC in circulation. But why is this important? The minting of a large sum of USDC typically indicates a significant demand for stablecoin liquidity within the crypto space. This demand can stem from various sources: Institutional Inflow: Large institutions or high-net-worth individuals might be looking to enter the crypto market, using USDC as their preferred on-ramp. They convert fiat into USDC to facilitate large trades without dealing with the volatility of other cryptocurrencies. DeFi Activity: Increased activity in decentralized finance (DeFi) protocols often drives demand for stablecoins. USDC is a cornerstone of many DeFi applications, including lending, borrowing, and yield farming. More USDC means more capital available for these activities. Exchange Demand: Centralized exchanges might request more USDC to meet user demand for trading pairs or to facilitate withdrawals. Market Stability: In times of market uncertainty, traders often convert volatile assets into stablecoins like USDC to preserve capital, increasing demand for its supply. Conversely, large mints can precede bullish moves if new capital is flowing in to buy other cryptocurrencies. This particular mint suggests that significant capital is either entering the crypto space or repositioning within it, seeking the stability that USDC offers while preparing for potential future moves. It reflects confidence in the underlying digital asset infrastructure. Why Are Stablecoins Like USDC Essential for the Crypto Market? Stablecoins are the backbone of the modern crypto economy, acting as a crucial bridge between traditional finance and the volatile world of cryptocurrencies. They address the primary challenge of price instability that often plagues cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin and Ethereum. Without stablecoins, conducting everyday transactions or even complex financial operations within the crypto space would be incredibly difficult due to constant price fluctuations. Here are several reasons why stablecoins are indispensable: Volatility Hedge: Traders use stablecoins to ‘park’ their funds during periods of high market volatility, protecting their capital from sudden price drops. It is the digital equivalent of moving money into a savings account during a stock market downturn. Trading Pairs: Most cryptocurrency exchanges offer trading pairs against stablecoins (e.g., BTC/USDC, ETH/USDC). This provides a stable reference point for valuing other digital assets and facilitates easier entry and exit from positions. Global Remittances and Payments: Stablecoins enable fast, low-cost cross-border transactions, bypassing traditional banking intermediaries and their associated fees and delays. This makes them a powerful tool for global commerce and remittances. DeFi Foundation: The decentralized finance ecosystem heavily relies on stablecoins. They are used as collateral for loans, as liquidity in automated market makers (AMMs), and as a basis for yield-generating strategies. Without stablecoins, the functionality and stability of DeFi would be severely limited. Accessibility: Stablecoins make it easier for individuals and businesses, especially in regions with unstable local currencies or limited access to traditional banking services, to access a stable digital asset pegged to a major fiat currency like the U.S. dollar. The consistent demand for stablecoins , evidenced by large mints like the recent 250 million USDC, underscores their fundamental role in providing liquidity, stability, and utility across the entire cryptocurrency ecosystem. They are not just a temporary phenomenon but a critical component of a maturing financial landscape. How Does This Impact the Broader Crypto Market ? The minting of 250 million USDC can have several direct and indirect impacts on the broader crypto market . Understanding these potential effects helps in gauging market sentiment and predicting future trends. Increased Liquidity The most immediate effect is an increase in liquidity. More USDC means more capital available to trade into other cryptocurrencies. This can: Boost Trading Volume: With more stablecoin available, exchanges can facilitate higher trading volumes for various crypto assets. Support Price Action: If the newly minted USDC is used to buy Bitcoin, Ethereum, or other altcoins, it can contribute to upward price pressure. This is often interpreted as a bullish signal, indicating new capital inflow. Facilitate Large Trades: Whales and institutional players can execute larger trades without causing significant slippage, thanks to deeper liquidity pools. Investor Sentiment Large stablecoin mints are often seen as a precursor to positive market movements. The rationale is that new money is entering the system, poised to be deployed into riskier assets. This can: Fuel Optimism: News of significant mints can instill confidence among investors, suggesting that smart money is accumulating stablecoins to buy dips or participate in an anticipated rally. Reduce Volatility (in some cases): Paradoxically, while new capital can fuel price swings, the availability of stablecoins also provides a safer haven during downturns, potentially reducing panic selling if traders can quickly convert to USDC. DeFi Ecosystem Growth As mentioned, DeFi relies heavily on stablecoins. A surge in USDC supply can: Lower Lending Rates: More available capital in lending protocols can lead to lower interest rates for borrowers, making DeFi more attractive. Increase Yield Opportunities: While lower lending rates might seem counterintuitive for yield farmers, increased liquidity can also lead to new and innovative yield strategies emerging, absorbing the excess capital. Support New Projects: New DeFi projects and protocols can launch with greater confidence, knowing there is ample stablecoin liquidity to support their ecosystems. While a single mint does not guarantee a bull run, a consistent pattern of large stablecoin mints often precedes or accompanies periods of growth in the crypto market . It is a key indicator that sophisticated investors are positioning themselves for action. The Growing Dominance of Digital Currency and USDC’s Role The minting of 250 million USDC is not just an isolated event within the crypto sphere; it is a testament to the accelerating shift towards a world dominated by digital currency . As technology advances and global economies become increasingly interconnected, the demand for efficient, borderless, and programmable money grows. USDC stands at the forefront of this evolution, serving as a pivotal example of how a private sector-led digital asset can achieve widespread adoption and utility. The concept of digital currency extends beyond cryptocurrencies to include central bank digital currencies (CBDCs) and tokenized traditional assets. However, stablecoins like USDC are currently leading the charge in practical, real-world applications. Their ability to combine the stability of fiat money with the efficiency of blockchain technology makes them ideal for: E-commerce and Online Payments: Facilitating instant settlements and reducing transaction fees for online businesses and consumers. Cross-Border Trade and Finance: Streamlining international payments, making them faster and cheaper for businesses and individuals alike, particularly important in emerging markets. Financial Inclusion: Providing access to financial services for the unbanked or underbanked populations globally, requiring only a smartphone and internet access. Programmable Money: Enabling smart contracts and automated financial operations, paving the way for innovative business models and financial products. USDC’s transparent reserve backing and regulatory compliance efforts have positioned it as a trusted player in the nascent digital currency landscape. As governments and central banks explore their own CBDCs, stablecoins like USDC are demonstrating the immense potential and practical benefits of digital money today. This large minting event simply reinforces the growing trust and utility of USDC as a preferred medium for value transfer in the digital age. Circle ‘s Strategic Move: Powering the Future of Finance At the heart of the USDC ecosystem is Circle , a global financial technology firm and one of the co-founders of Centre. The recent 250 million USDC mint is a direct action taken by Circle to meet market demand, highlighting their strategic position in the evolving financial landscape. Circle ‘s vision extends beyond simply issuing a stablecoin; they aim to build an internet of value where money can flow as freely and instantly as information. Circle ‘s strategy revolves around several key pillars: Transparency and Trust: Circle regularly publishes audited attestations of USDC reserves, ensuring that every USDC token in circulation is backed by an equivalent amount of U.S. dollars and short-duration U.S. Treasury bonds. This commitment to transparency is crucial for building user confidence and attracting institutional adoption. Regulatory Compliance: As a regulated entity, Circle adheres to strict financial regulations, which differentiates USDC from some other stablecoins. This approach makes USDC more palatable for traditional financial institutions and corporations looking to engage with digital assets. Global Expansion: Circle is actively expanding its global reach, forging partnerships with banks, payment providers, and businesses worldwide to facilitate the broader adoption of USDC for payments, remittances, and treasury management. Innovation in Web3: Beyond being a stablecoin issuer, Circle is investing in and supporting the broader Web3 ecosystem, providing developer tools and infrastructure to build new applications and services leveraging USDC. The minting of such a large sum of USDC reflects Circle ‘s responsiveness to market needs and their ongoing commitment to providing robust financial infrastructure for the digital economy. It underscores their role as a key player in bridging the gap between traditional finance and the decentralized future, actively shaping how value is transferred and managed globally. Their strategic moves are not just about stablecoins; they are about laying the groundwork for a new era of financial services. Challenges and Considerations for Stablecoins While the benefits of stablecoins like USDC are clear, it is important to acknowledge potential challenges and considerations: Regulatory Scrutiny: Governments worldwide are increasing their scrutiny of stablecoins, with discussions around requiring them to be issued by regulated banks or adhere to stricter capital requirements. This evolving regulatory landscape could impact their operations. Centralization Concerns: Fiat-backed stablecoins like USDC rely on centralized entities (like Circle) to hold reserves and issue tokens. This introduces a point of centralization, which some in the decentralized community view with caution. Auditing and Transparency: While Circle provides attestations, the depth and frequency of audits are continuously debated within the community, with calls for real-time, comprehensive audits to ensure full backing. Systemic Risk: As stablecoins grow in size and importance, their potential impact on the broader financial system becomes a concern for regulators, particularly regarding potential runs or liquidity crises. These challenges highlight the need for continued vigilance, robust risk management, and ongoing dialogue between innovators and policymakers to ensure stablecoins can continue to grow responsibly. Actionable Insights for the Crypto Enthusiast For individuals and institutions navigating the crypto space, the recent 250 million USDC mint offers several actionable insights: Monitor Stablecoin Activity: Keep an eye on large stablecoin mints and burns. They often provide leading indicators for market sentiment and potential capital flows. Understand Liquidity: Recognize that increased stablecoin supply contributes to overall market liquidity, which can facilitate smoother trading and potentially larger price movements. Diversify Your Holdings: While stablecoins offer stability, remember they are still digital assets. Consider a diversified portfolio that includes a mix of stablecoins, major cryptocurrencies, and potentially other digital assets. Stay Informed on Regulations: The regulatory environment for stablecoins is dynamic. Staying updated on new laws and guidelines can help you understand potential impacts on your holdings and activities. Explore DeFi Opportunities: With ample USDC liquidity, the DeFi ecosystem often presents attractive opportunities for lending, borrowing, and yield farming. Research protocols carefully and understand the associated risks. A Future Powered by Digital Value The minting of 250 million USDC is more than just a transaction; it is a powerful signal of the ongoing maturation and expansion of the digital asset economy. It underscores the critical role that stablecoins play in providing liquidity and stability, bridging the gap between traditional finance and the innovative world of blockchain. As demand for efficient, borderless, and transparent financial tools continues to surge, USDC, backed by the strategic vision of Circle, is poised to remain a cornerstone of the burgeoning digital currency landscape. This event is a clear indicator that capital is flowing into the ecosystem, positioning the market for continued growth and innovation. The future of finance is undoubtedly digital, and stablecoins like USDC are paving the way for its widespread adoption and utility. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping digital currency institutional adoption. This post Massive USDC Mint Signals Bullish Crypto Market Confidence first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

title: Bitcoin bounced back to $122K after dropping on failed crypto bills in Congress
body: Wall Street stocks flipped out Wednesday after someone inside the White House told CNBC that Trump might fire Jerome Powell as Fed chair. That single comment kicked off chaos. The S&P 500 dropped hard at first, down 0.6%, before clawing its way back into the green once Trump denied the whole thing . By the Closing Bell, the S&P 500 scraped out a tiny 0.1% gain. Nasdaq also managed to add 0.1% after tanking nearly 0.8% during the day. The Dow Jones did slightly better, up 162 points, or 0.3%, but that’s only after it was down more than 260 points earlier. Traders were stuck in limbo. Nobody knew whether to trust the official denial or brace for another bombshell. “The markets would not like it if Powell was fired,” said Larry Tentarelli from Blue Chip Daily Trend Report. “It’s obviously a political hotbed… but overall, most of the big market participants that I know of think Powell has done a very good job.” Translation? If Trump pulls the trigger, stocks could get wrecked. Semiconductor names drag down tech sector Tech wasn’t safe either. Chip stocks started bleeding, and it wasn’t subtle. The VanEck Semiconductor ETF is now down 0.6% for the week and could snap a seven-week win streak. That would be its worst performance since its eight-week rally ended in March 2019. ASML took the biggest hit. Shares were down 9.5% by midday Wednesday, already sitting 7% lower on the week. That’s ASML’s worst day since October 15, 2024, and its worst week since April. And the kicker? This came after the company beat both top- and bottom-line expectations in its second-quarter results. But the problem is what they said next: They don’t know if they’ll grow in 2026. Uncertainty like that makes investors run for the hills. Other chip names got slammed too. Micron Technology, Marvell Technology, Monolithic Power Systems, Teradyne, and NXP Semiconductor all ended the day in the red. Nvidia, after printing an all-time high on Tuesday, cooled off a bit. Shares slipped slightly, but the company is still pacing for its eighth straight weekly gain, up 3.4% this week. AMD followed suit with a strong 5% gain for the week so far, looking good for a second solid green close. Meanwhile, bank earnings came in Tuesday , and they looked decent on paper. Goldman Sachs, Morgan Stanley, and Bank of America all beat expectations. But their stocks didn’t care. Every single one traded lower. The market clearly isn’t buying the narrative, or maybe it just didn’t matter with the Fed drama stealing the spotlight. Bitcoin recovers, Ether starts to break out While stocks whiplashed, crypto made a nasty dip before bouncing right back. Bitcoin crashed to $115,000 late Tuesday night after the House shot down a set of crypto bills. That vote was a slap to the face for anyone expecting clear rules in the near term. But by Wednesday, BTC was back at $122K. Traders didn’t wait around; they bought the dip instantly. Ether, on the other hand, actually looked stronger than Bitcoin. It’s now broken out of a long-standing inverse head-and-shoulders pattern, which had been forming all year. Holding above the $2,870 breakout level gives it a target of $4,375. And it’s not just chart theory here. Momentum is blasting higher. ETH’s 14-day RSI jumped from the low 30s to the mid-70s in four weeks. In May, that number hit nearly 90 before things cooled down. So the move we’re seeing right now is sharp—and it’s real. If ether keeps pushing and hits that $4,375 target, it’ll blow past its December 2023 highs and start testing the top of the 2021 cycle. That would complete a multi-year bullish base that’s been building on the monthly log chart. Even more interesting? Ether’s been outperforming Bitcoin. Since the lows in April, BTC has climbed 60%. ETH? Up 130%. Cryptopolitan Academy: Tired of market swings? Learn how DeFi can help you build steady passive income. Register Now

title: Ripple’s XRP Soars Above $3, Flips Tether (USDT) as 3rd Largest Crypto Asset
body: The post Ripple’s XRP Soars Above $3, Flips Tether (USDT) as 3rd Largest Crypto Asset appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News Ripple Labs-backed XRP gained 5 percent in the past 24 hours to trade above $3.04 on Wednesday, July 16, during the mid-North American trading session. The large-cap altcoin, with a fully diluted valuation of about $304 billion, reached the highest level in 24 weeks, thus flipping Tether (USDT) as the third-largest crypto asset. As a result, XRP price has regained all the losses registered after President Donald Trump took office for the second term earlier this year. According to aggregate market data from Coingecko, XRP price gained over 26 percent in the past seven days, thus outshining the majority of large-cap altcoins. XRP Bulls Bolstered by Robust Fundamentals The ongoing XRP pump is largely backed by robust fundamentals both from Ripple and external factors. For instance, Ripple Labs is almost concluding the four-year lawsuit filed by the U.S. SEC, which will give XRP much-needed regulatory clarity. The crypto payment company announced earlier on Wednesday that it partnered with Ctrl Alt and the Dubai Land Department to tokenize the country’s title deeds on the XRPL network. The bullish sentiment for XRP has also been influenced by the procedural passage of the crypto bills on Wednesday including the GENIUS Act. What Next? The XRP bullish breakout above $3 in 2025 has coincided with the rising calls for an altseason. Furthermore, on-chain data analysis reveals that whale investors have been accumulating more altcoins compared to Bitcoin in the recent past. #XRP bull flags.. We all know what comes next! pic.twitter.com/whZnm5nxbo — STEPH IS CRYPTO (@Steph_iscrypto) July 16, 2025 From a technical analysis standpoint, XRP price has successfully broken out of a bullish flag and is now on the cusp of entering its euphoric phase of the 2025 bull rally. If history repeats itself, XRP price is well set to rally beyond $10 in this cycle fueled by regulatory clarity and rising demand from institutional investors.

title: GENIUS Act, Anti-CBDC Act, and CLARITY Act Pass Procedural Vote in Congress
body: The U.S. House of Representatives voted 215-211 on July 16 to pass a procedural motion, allowing the GENIUS stablecoin bill, the Digital Asset Market Clarity Act, and the Anti-CBDC Surveillance State Act to proceed to final votes, marking a dramatic turnaround after President Trump’s Tuesday night Oval Office intervention. The procedural victory came just 24 hours after an unexpected 196-223 defeat during “Crypto Week” that threatened to derail the administration’s comprehensive digital asset legislation agenda. BREAKING: US HOUSE JUST PASSED #BITCOIN AND CRYPTO BILLS REVOTE ON MOTION HERE WE GO!!! pic.twitter.com/bfC9pIXhEV — Vivek (@Vivek4real_) July 16, 2025 Crypto Legislation Passed Despite Democrats’ Coordinated Attack Zero Democrats supported the procedural motion, with the outcome determined entirely by Republican unity following Trump’s direct intervention. The GENIUS Act has already passed the Senate 68-30 in June with bipartisan support, including 18 Democrats joining most Republicans. The stablecoin-focused legislation could reach President Trump’s desk later this week, representing the first major cryptocurrency legislation to clear both chambers of Congress. Trump’s late-evening meeting with 11 GOP holdouts Tuesday night proved decisive in securing the commitments needed to advance all three bills. The president announced on Truth Social that the Republicans “have all agreed to vote tomorrow morning in favor of the Rule” after their Oval Office discussion. Trump secures 11 GOP votes for GENIUS Act following crucial Oval Office meeting after unexpected 196-223 defeat as crypto legislation vote expected tomorrow. #GENIUSAct #Trump https://t.co/ZS9K5k7A9t — Cryptonews.com (@cryptonews) July 16, 2025 The breakthrough occurred despite persistent Republican concerns about potential central bank digital currency authorization, even though the GENIUS Act explicitly states it “ shall not be construed as expanding the Fed’s authority to offer services directly to the public. “ Trump’s Personal Diplomacy Rescues Stalled Crypto Agenda Thirteen Republicans initially voted against Tuesday’s procedural rule, citing fears about CBDC issuance despite clear prohibitive language in the legislation. The revolt included prominent conservatives such as Reps. Marjorie Taylor Greene (Ga.), Chip Roy (Texas), and Andy Biggs (Ariz.). The Republican resistance occurred despite the House leadership’s strategy to advance the Senate version without amendments, seeking to expedite delivery to Trump’s desk. This approach was designed to avoid potential complications from extended congressional negotiations or bundling with more contentious crypto legislation. The GENIUS Act establishes federal licensing requirements for stablecoin issuers and mandates full backing with U.S. dollars or equivalent liquid assets. Consumer protections are included for bankruptcy scenarios, with stablecoin holders receiving priority payments over other creditors. The timing coincided with the final push for crypto legislation during the administration’s designated “Crypto Week.” The guidance removes “reputational risk” as a factor in bank supervision, creating major opportunities for traditional financial institutions to engage with digital assets. The Anti-CBDC Surveillance State Act explicitly prohibits the Federal Reserve from issuing a central bank digital currency, while the CLARITY Act establishes comprehensive market structure regulations for digital assets. The GENIUS Act is clear: the @federalreserve does not have authority to issue a CBDC. Chairman @SenatorTimScott will continue pushing back on any overreach from the Federal Reserve. pic.twitter.com/1xEUWyd50V — U.S. Senate Banking Committee GOP (@BankingGOP) July 16, 2025 Even more, Senate Banking Committee Chairman Tim Scott emphasized that the GENIUS Act makes it clear that the Federal Reserve lacks the authority to issue a CBDC. This latest development comes as federal banking regulators issued guidance Monday clarifying that banks can provide cryptocurrency custody services in both fiduciary and non-fiduciary arrangements. The post GENIUS Act, Anti-CBDC Act, and CLARITY Act Pass Procedural Vote in Congress appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: Bitcoin ETF: ARK Invest’s Strategic Sale Unveils Crucial Market Insights
body: BitcoinWorld Bitcoin ETF: ARK Invest’s Strategic Sale Unveils Crucial Market Insights The world of cryptocurrency is constantly buzzing with significant developments, and institutional moves often send ripples across the market. Recently, a notable event involving Cathie Wood’s ARK Invest captured headlines: a substantial sale of its Bitcoin ETF shares. This strategic move, valued at $8.7 million, marks ARK Invest’s largest sale since a pivotal stock split in mid-June, prompting many to ask: what does this mean for the future of Bitcoin ETF holdings and the broader crypto investment landscape? What’s Behind ARK Invest’s Latest Bitcoin ETF Sale? On July 16, Cathie Wood’s renowned investment management firm, ARK Invest, executed a significant transaction, selling 225,742 shares of its ARK 21Shares Bitcoin ETF (ARKB). This sale amounted to a remarkable $8.7 million, making it the largest divestment by the firm in this particular ETF since a 3-for-1 stock split occurred in mid-June. ARK Invest, known for its focus on disruptive innovation, has been a prominent player in the digital asset space, often making bold moves that reflect its long-term conviction in technologies like blockchain and artificial intelligence. This recent sale naturally raises questions. Is it a strategic rebalancing of their portfolio? A move to lock in profits after a period of Bitcoin’s price appreciation? Or perhaps a reflection of a broader shift in their tactical allocation? Understanding the nuances of such institutional actions is crucial for anyone monitoring the market, as firms like ARK Invest often set precedents or signal trends. Understanding the Dynamics of Bitcoin ETF and ARKB For many investors, a Bitcoin ETF offers a regulated and accessible way to gain exposure to the price movements of Bitcoin without directly owning the cryptocurrency. The ARK 21Shares Bitcoin ETF (ARKB) is one such instrument, launched after years of anticipation for spot Bitcoin ETFs in the United States. These ETFs aim to track the real-time price of Bitcoin, providing institutional and retail investors with a familiar investment vehicle. The introduction of spot Bitcoin ETFs earlier this year was hailed as a landmark event, signifying growing mainstream acceptance and institutional adoption of digital assets. Funds like ARKB have seen considerable inflows, demonstrating a strong appetite for this new investment avenue. However, like any financial product, Bitcoin ETFs are subject to market dynamics, including inflows, outflows, and the strategic decisions of major holders like ARK Invest. Key characteristics of ARKB and similar Bitcoin ETFs: Accessibility: Traded on traditional stock exchanges, making them easy to buy and sell through standard brokerage accounts. Regulation: Subject to regulatory oversight, offering a layer of investor protection not always present in direct crypto purchases. Price Tracking: Designed to closely track the price of Bitcoin, providing indirect exposure. Liquidity: Generally offer good liquidity, allowing for efficient entry and exit points. The Impact of a Stock Split: Why Did ARKB Adjust Its Shares? The ARK Invest sale followed a 3-for-1 stock split for ARKB in mid-June. A stock split is a corporate action where a company increases the number of its outstanding shares by dividing each existing share into multiple shares. In a 3-for-1 split, one share becomes three shares, and the price per share is proportionally reduced. For example, if a share was trading at $100 before the split, it would trade at approximately $33.33 after the split. Why do companies perform stock splits, especially for an ETF like ARKB? Increased Accessibility: A lower per-share price can make the ETF more appealing to a broader range of investors, particularly retail investors who might perceive a lower price as more affordable. Enhanced Liquidity: With more shares outstanding, the trading volume often increases, leading to greater liquidity in the market. Psychological Effect: A lower share price can create a perception of being ‘cheaper’ or more ‘affordable,’ even though the total value of an investor’s holding remains unchanged. It’s crucial to understand that a stock split does not change the fundamental value of the ETF or the total value of an investor’s holdings. If an investor owned 100 shares at $100 each (totaling $10,000) before a 3-for-1 split, they would own 300 shares at approximately $33.33 each (still totaling $10,000) after the split. The recent sale by ARK Invest, therefore, needs to be viewed in the context of these adjusted share prices, but the dollar value of the sale remains the key metric. Decoding Cathie Wood’s Investment Philosophy: A Strategic Shift or Portfolio Rebalancing? Cathie Wood , CEO and CIO of ARK Invest, is renowned for her high-conviction, long-term investment strategy focused on disruptive innovation. Her firm’s portfolios often include companies at the forefront of technologies like artificial intelligence, genomics, robotics, and, notably, blockchain. ARK Invest’s consistent belief in Bitcoin as a transformative technology and a potential hedge against inflation has been a cornerstone of their digital asset strategy. Given this philosophy, a significant sale of ARKB shares by ARK Invest warrants closer examination. It could be interpreted in several ways: Profit-Taking: After a period of strong performance in the crypto market, it’s a common strategy for institutional investors to take some profits off the table to manage risk or reallocate capital. Portfolio Rebalancing: ARK Invest manages multiple funds, and this sale might be part of a broader rebalancing effort across their diverse portfolios to maintain desired asset allocations or to fund new investment opportunities in other high-conviction areas. Tactical Adjustment: While ARK is known for long-term views, they also make tactical adjustments based on market conditions, liquidity needs, or specific fund mandates. This could be a tactical move in response to current market sentiment or anticipated shifts. It is less likely to signal a fundamental change in ARK Invest’s long-term bullish stance on Bitcoin itself, given their consistent advocacy and continued involvement in the crypto ecosystem. However, it underscores the dynamic nature of institutional investment strategies, even among those with strong thematic convictions. Navigating the Broader Crypto Investment Landscape: What Does This Mean for Investors? The sale by ARK Invest, while significant, should be viewed within the broader crypto investment landscape. Institutional participation in Bitcoin and other digital assets has grown exponentially, bringing both stability and new dynamics to the market. While a large sale can sometimes trigger short-term market reactions, it’s essential for investors to look beyond immediate headlines and consider the larger trends. For individual investors, this event offers several actionable insights: Don’t Panic: A single institutional sale, even a large one, does not necessarily signal a collapse or a negative long-term outlook for Bitcoin or Bitcoin ETFs. Markets are complex, and institutional decisions are often multifaceted. Understand Institutional Strategy: Recognize that large firms like ARK Invest have complex portfolio management strategies, including risk management, rebalancing, and profit-taking. Their moves are not always direct indicators of their long-term conviction. Focus on Fundamentals: Continue to evaluate the underlying fundamentals of Bitcoin and the broader crypto market, such as adoption rates, technological developments, regulatory clarity, and macroeconomic factors. Diversify: As always, diversification remains a key principle in investing. Do not put all your eggs in one basket, whether it’s a single crypto asset or a single ETF. Stay Informed: Keep abreast of news from reputable sources and analyze it critically. Understand the context behind major institutional moves. The ongoing evolution of the crypto investment space, with increasing institutional involvement, means that market participants need to be more sophisticated in their analysis. Events like ARK Invest’s ARKB sale serve as important reminders that even pioneers in the space actively manage their positions. Conclusion: Navigating Institutional Waves in the Crypto Market ARK Invest’s $8.7 million sale of its Bitcoin ETF shares, following a strategic stock split, is a significant event that highlights the dynamic nature of institutional crypto investment. While the immediate reaction might be to speculate on its implications, a deeper dive reveals it’s likely a combination of profit-taking, portfolio rebalancing, and tactical adjustments within Cathie Wood’s overarching investment philosophy. This move underscores the growing maturity of the Bitcoin ETF market and the complex strategies employed by major players. For investors, the key takeaway is to remain informed, understand the multi-faceted reasons behind institutional actions, and focus on long-term fundamentals rather than short-term fluctuations caused by individual transactions. The journey of crypto into mainstream finance continues, marked by such strategic maneuvers that shape its path forward. To learn more about the latest explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin ETF institutional adoption. This post Bitcoin ETF: ARK Invest’s Strategic Sale Unveils Crucial Market Insights first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

title: A Critical Development on Donald Trump’s Altcoin WLFI: Anticipated Vote Ends
body: Investors in World Liberty Financial (WLFI), one of the cryptocurrency ventures owned by the Donald Trump family, have voted to open the tokens for trading. This move, approved today, will now allow the platform's tokens to be traded on exchanges, potentially significantly increasing the value of the Trump family's holdings. World Liberty, a “decentralized finance” (DeFi) initiative launched by the Trump family and their associates last fall, offered investors digital tokens called WLFI and a stablecoin. However, these tokens were initially non-tradable, with token holders only given the right to vote on changes such as the platform's underlying code structure. The biggest draw for investors was the direct connection to Trump's name. This connection had fueled expectations that the tokens would appreciate in value over time. Now, the tokens' ability to be traded on the open market could increase speculative interest and potentially earn trading fees for crypto exchanges where they are listed. Once the tokens become available for trading, the value of the Trump family's holdings could increase. While the exact amount of tokens held by the family has not been disclosed, Trump's company, DT Marks DEFI LLC, was scheduled to receive 22.5 billion of the 100 billion tokens, according to the project's launch documents. According to publicly released financial reports, President Trump held 15.75 billion WLFI tokens as of the end of 2024. Related News: BREAKING: FED's Highly Anticipated Beige Book Document Published - Here Are The Details The Trump family has earned approximately $500 million to date through the World Liberty platform. However, this development also raises ethical questions. Democratic Senator Elizabeth Warren and Representative Maxine Waters wrote in a letter to the US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) that the Trump family's financial interests in World Liberty pose an “unprecedented conflict of interest.” The letter stated that these interests could influence the Trump administration's regulatory stance toward the crypto sector. The SEC has not yet classified WLFI tokens as securities, which exempts them from the same stringent regulatory oversight as stocks. The White House has maintained that all of Trump's assets are held in a trust managed by his children and that there is no conflict of interest. However, details of the trust structure have not been made public. The trust's sole beneficiary designation of President Trump means that hundreds of millions of dollars in cryptocurrency transactions made during his term could be used personally at any time. World Liberty published its proposal to open trading for WLFI tokens on its website on July 9. Of the approximately 20,900 votes cast, 99.94% voted “yes.” A World Liberty spokesperson told Reuters that details of how the tokens would be traded would be released soon. *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: A Critical Development on Donald Trump’s Altcoin WLFI: Anticipated Vote Ends
